title: Git & GitHub
text: Elevate your version control and collaboration with One Dev's integrated Git and GitHub features. Power up your development workflow, manage code efficiently, and enhance collaboration seamlessly.

section.title: Version Control
section.content: Take control of your codebase with Git integration. One Dev provides a user-friendly interface for essential Git commands, enabling you to track changes, and more with ease

section.title: GitHub Integration
section.content: Connect to your GitHub repositories directly from One Dev. Clone, push, and pull changes effortlessly. Stay connected to your repositories, all within a unified developer toolkit.
